result.eng: They came back at the end of the summer.
result.ga: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.orig: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidh
result.html: Tháinig siad ar ais ag deireadh an tsamhraidhThey came back at the end of the summer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad ar ais ag deireaḋ an tsaṁraiḋThey came back at the end of the summer.

result.eng: We expected three but only one person came.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.orig: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.html: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duineWe expected three but only one person came.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor ṫáinig aċ duineWe expected three but only one person came.

result.eng: A foul smell came out.
result.ga: Tháinig boladh bréan amach
result.orig: Tháinig boladh bréan amach
result.html: Tháinig boladh bréan amachA foul smell came out.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig bolaḋ bréan amaċA foul smell came out.

result.eng: Why did you not come?
result.ga: Cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.orig: Cad chuige nár tháinig tú
result.html: Cad chuige nár tháinig túWhy did you not come?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige nár ṫáinig túWhy did you not come?

result.eng: Where did you come from?
result.ga: Cá as ar tháinig sibh
result.orig: Cá as ar tháinig sibh
result.html: Cá as ar tháinig sibhWhere did you come from?
result.ponchtml: Cá as ar ṫáinig siḃWhere did you come from?

result.eng: Thanks to everybody who came.
result.ga: Go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinig
result.orig: Go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinig
result.html: Go raibh maith ag gach duine a tháinigThanks to everybody who came.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ ag gaċ duine a ṫáinigThanks to everybody who came.

result.eng: When I came to the world.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.orig: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.html: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ṫáinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.

result.eng: Nobody came.
result.ga: Níor tháinig duine ar bith
result.orig: Níor tháinig duine ar bith
result.html: Níor tháinig duine ar bithNobody came.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫáinig duine ar biṫNobody came.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ga: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis go raiḃ sé ina ċónaí sa Ġearmáin le ḋá ḃliain níor ṫáinig feaḃas ar biṫ ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.orig: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.html: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig an post isteaċ um 7 45 gaċ maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.eng: The country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.
result.ga: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil
result.orig: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil
result.html: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháilThe country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig aos litearṫa na tíre le ċéile ag an ċoṁḋáilThe country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.

result.eng: We got a package in the post.
result.ga: Tháinig beart sa phost
result.orig: Tháinig beart sa phost
result.html: Tháinig beart sa phostWe got a package in the post.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig beart sa ṗostWe got a package in the post.

result.eng: People came in crowds.
result.ga: Tháinig daoine ina sluaite
result.orig: Tháinig daoine ina sluaite
result.html: Tháinig daoine ina sluaitePeople came in crowds.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig daoine ina sluaitePeople came in crowds.

result.eng: We reached a settlement.

result.orig: Tháinig muid ar réiteach
result.html: Tháinig muid ar réiteachWe reached a settlement.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig muid ar réiteaċWe reached a settlement.

result.eng: I came on the bicycle.
result.ga: Tháinig mé ar an rothar
result.orig: Tháinig mé ar an rothar
result.html: Tháinig mé ar an rotharI came on the bicycle.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig mé ar an roṫarI came on the bicycle.

result.eng: I arrived yesterday.
result.ga: Tháinig mé inné
result.orig: Tháinig mé inné
result.html: Tháinig mé innéI arrived yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig mé innéI arrived yesterday.

result.eng: They came home from the party.
result.ga: Tháinig siad abhaile ón chóisir
result.orig: Tháinig siad abhaile ón chóisir
result.html: Tháinig siad abhaile ón chóisirThey came home from the party.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad aḃaile ón ċóisirThey came home from the party.

result.eng: They came from the north.
result.ga: Tháinig siad aduaidh
result.orig: Tháinig siad aduaidh
result.html: Tháinig siad aduaidhThey came from the north.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad aduaiḋThey came from the north.

result.eng: They came back.
result.ga: Tháinig siad ar ais
result.orig: Tháinig siad ar ais
result.html: Tháinig siad ar aisThey came back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig siad ar aisThey came back.

result.eng: He arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ga: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.orig: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.html: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé agus leaḃar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.

result.eng: It came here.
result.ga: Tháinig sé anseo
result.orig: Tháinig sé anseo
result.html: Tháinig sé anseoIt came here.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé anseoIt came here.

result.eng: He came to the country in June 1922.
result.ga: Tháinig sé chun na tíre i Meitheamh 1922

result.html: Tháinig sé chun na tíre i Meitheamh 1922He came to the country in June 1922.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé ċun na tíre i Meiṫeaṁ 1922He came to the country in June 1922.

result.eng: She came out of the house.
result.ga: Tháinig sí amach as an teach
result.orig: Tháinig sí amach as an teach
result.html: Tháinig sí amach as an teachShe came out of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí amaċ as an teaċShe came out of the house.

result.eng: She came over for a visit.
result.ga: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairt
result.orig: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairt
result.html: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.

result.eng: We came at about three o'clock.
result.ga: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.orig: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlog
result.html: Tháinig muid i dtrátha a trí a chlogWe came at about three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig muid i dtráṫa a trí a ċlogWe came at about three o'clock.

result.eng: You are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ga: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.orig: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anocht
result.html: Tá sibh ar na chéad daoine a tháinig anochtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá siḃ ar na ċéad daoine a ṫáinig anoċtYou are one of the first people who came tonight.

result.eng: Mother started looking worried.
result.ga: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na máthar
result.orig: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na máthar
result.html: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na mátharMother started looking worried.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig dreaċ imníoċ ar aġaiḋ na máṫarMother started looking worried.

result.eng: Some of the horses got scared.
result.ga: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.orig: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaill
result.html: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig eagla ar ċuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.

result.eng: She became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ga: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.orig: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthi
result.html: Tháinig eagla a báis uirthiShe became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig eagla a báis uirṫiShe became afraid of (her own) death.

result.eng: Her eyes started running.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena súile
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena súile
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.html: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi Ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: The words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ga: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.orig: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaile
result.html: Tháinig na focail amach as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na focail amaċ as a béal ina néalta beaga gaileThe words came out of her mouth as small clouds of steam.

result.eng: Where did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ga: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.orig: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadan
result.html: Cad as ar tháinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?
result.ponchtml: Cad as ar ṫáinig na roic ina éadanWhere did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?

result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.orig: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann

result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí an obráid ṫart ṫáinig an doċtúir amaċ as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.html: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí beirt iníonaċa óga ina diaiḋ nuair a ṫáinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.

result.eng: But he survived the war.
result.ga: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadh
result.orig: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadh
result.html: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadhBut he survived the war.
result.ponchtml: Aċ ṫáinig sé slán as an gcogaḋBut he survived the war.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: A little later in the day he bought some bread.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig as an lá cheannaigh sé giota aráin

result.html: Nuair a tháinig as an lá cheannaigh sé giota aráinA little later in the day he bought some bread.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.

result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: What happened to her?

result.eng: Tears came into his eyes.
result.ga: Tháinig na deora leis
result.orig: Tháinig na deora leis
result.html: Tháinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
